mapper.insert: insert into tbl_clue( id, fullname, appellation, owner, company, job, email, phone, website, mphone, state, source, createBy, createTime, description, contactSummary, nextContactTime, address ) value ( #{id}, #{fullname}, #{appellation}, #{owner}, #{company}, #{job}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{website}, #{mphone}, #{state}, #{source}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{description}, #{contactSummary}, #{nextContactTime}, #{address} )
mapper.select: select a.id, a.fullname, a.appellation, b.name as owner, a.company, a.job, a.email, a.phone, a.website, a.mphone, a.state, a.source, a.createBy, a.createTime, a.editBy, a.editTime, a.description, a.contactSummary, a.nextContactTime, a.address from tbl_clue a join tbl_user b on a.owner = b.id
